alert.note: Alert for Clay; Jackson; Laurel (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 11:09PM EDT until July 02 at 11:45PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Laurel County in south central Kentucky... Southeastern Jackson County in southeastern Kentucky... Northwestern Clay County in southeastern Kentucky... * Until 1145 PM EDT. * At 1109 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over London, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Langnau around 1115 PM EDT. Portersburg around 1120 PM EDT. Grace around 1125 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Fall Rock and Laurel Creek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
